content.rendered:
Welcome to Excel Cargo Logistics
Logistics from mutual trust.
Track Now
International Cargo Logistics
Delivering Logistics Solution. On-time, every-time.
Track Now
Transport Your Goods Around the World
We specialize in computerized management, Sea freight, Inland freight, Air freight.
Track Now
Warehousing and Storage
Warehouse services can be offered as a single service or combined with transport.
Track Now

We Are Excel Cargo

We are international forwarder freight for imports and/or exports from any country. We have experience in the management and administration of international trade operations and logistics. Our team of experts specializes in project shipping services worldwide.

About us

Honest with mutual trust

Our team is ready for every customer, with one goal: the best, most efficient logistic solution.

Cargo Logistics Solutions

We specializes in managing difficult, out of gauge and heavy cargo shipments worldwide
Read more
Safe Delivery
Safe Delivery 96%
Support
Support 89%
Fast Delivery
Fast Delivery 92%

Logistics Made easy

Excel Cargo shipping, logistics, and marine services built on quality, safety, and sustainability with the human touch. Emphasizing a long-term approach, sustainability, innovation, and ethics, ECL delivers flexible integrated portfolios to customers globally.

  • We Provide Time-Definite and Cost-Effective Solutions
Logistics Through Technology

Step into our world. Meet the people behind the solutions, both colleagues and customers, to discover how we deliver progress to society with sustainability as our focus and responsibility as our foundation. This year we have even improved our strong position as the most visionary leader.

Tracking
services

Our Services

Combining the latest logistics technology with high-quality service, and the ability to offer customized solutions, Excel Cargo logistics services are ideal for customers seeking to grow their businesses.

Transportation

We provide fast, efficient, cost-effective solutions that are optimized for every business need.
Read More

Specialized Transport

We provides optimal solutions for all customer requirements with our technical skills.
Read More

Supply Chain

Our ability to deliver services meeting a variety of needs. IT tools underpinned by practical operations.
Read More

Warehousing

We own warehousing space consisting of approximately 2.95-million square meters overseas.
Read More

Solutions

We transcends national borders to provide one-stop business solutions in our role of logistics.
Read More

Products & Services

We have developed unique transport services across our global network to satisfy the needs of clients worldwide.
Read More

We Manage The Project Life Cycle

Cargo Insurance

Whether you ship by land, sea or air, our cargo insurance coverage provides solid protection from the moment your goods leave the warehouse until they arrive at the destination.

Engineered Transport Plans

Our well-planned and sensitively designed transport plans provide essential connectivity for the sustainability of the project and ensure the well-being of communities.

Project Planning and Permits

Our project management and logistics professionals have the experience, training, and advanced certifications in a variety of areas and can assist with any need you may have before, during and after your project.

Riggers and Crane Services

No other company can match Excel Cargo’s resume of experience, equipment, and geographic footprint to provide a full range of rigging and crane services.

Multi-Axle Heavy Haul Equipment

Professional heavy equipment trucking services to get your job handled securely, and delivered on-time.

Innovation in vehicles help make the SupplyChain and Logistics industries more efficient.

James Gingerich Tweet

Why Choose Us

Awards & Recognition

Excel Cargo Logistics continues to be recognized as fast-growing company, a leading 3PL, a top freight brokerage and dry storage warehousing firm.

0 +
Countries We Operate In
Logistics Achiever Awards Objectives!

A 21st Century Logistics Company™

With our trademark Passion for Excellence™, we put the + in logistics by doing the big things properly, plus the countless little things that ensure complete customer satisfaction and success. We manage Global Logistics + So Much More!

Read More
Recognise Excellence

To recognise professionalism and excellence in the effective application of strategic, tactical, and operational logistics and supply chain management.

Encourage Innovation

To encourage all companies and organisations in Southern Africa to review, evaluate and upgrade their current logistics and supply chain management.

Create Awareness

To create a greater awareness and understanding of the value of effective logistics and supply chain management.

Excel Cargo Logistics is Hiring!

We are filling various roles. Join our cool, global company.

Read More
Our Portfolio of Services

Delivering Time Sensitive, Complex, and High-Valued Solutions!

We are experts in transportation, logistics, forwarding and warehousing, supported by our innovative technology platforms and integrations.

Air Transportation

A proven track record of handling all types of cargo to remote locations around the world.

Ocean Transportation

While in some ways the world is getting smaller, the global marketplace seems to keep expanding.

Land Transportation

Our strategic relationships enable quicker fulfillment time and reduced supply chain costs.

Gallery
See More
Testimonials

Trusted by Thousand of Customers and Companies

0
★★★★★ 5/5
2,394 Ratings
Google Reviews
When every other forwarder in the world gave up, Excel Cargo Logistics showed up to perform. We’ve almost managed to clear our China ocean FCL backlog working through Jacob and Denise. Excel Cargo is the real deal evidently…
★★★★★ 5/5
Emma Hart
Dear Excel Cargo Team, I wanted to send out a special thanks for the gift box of local Erie items that you sent for the holidays. We loved it here at (our company/location)! My wife and I…
★★★★★ 5/5
Eddie Johnson
Thank you for your continued partnership throughout this year. It has been a challenging year and will be challenging moving forward. We greatly appreciate your team. Their fast and friendly service is a rare gem…
★★★★★ 5/5
Jonathan Doe
There are companies that promise to do a great job and then there are companies that actually keep that promise. Excel Cargo has been an excellent partner and I credit a lot of our success to the support that their TEAM provides. We value our relationship
Mike Edward
★★★★★ 5/5

OUR CARRIERS

Some of Our Carriers For Global Coverage.

Previous
Next

Online Reviews Comments Testimonials

I am very impressed with the quality of support provided by the Excel Cargo Logistic’s team.
A. BeekmanPresident & Founder Raw Materials
You are definitely the miracle worker!!! … Thanks so much for the BOLs. Sure glad that shipment ordeal is over!!! You sure did a wonderful job of handling this shipment for us.
J. KrauseCEO All Sports Endurance
I just want to take time to compliment you guys on your IMPRESSIVE work.
Kira RademacherPresident of Sales Stem Footwear
Previous
Next
Rachel Atkinson@tiny_te
Read More
Special thanks to you and the team for carrying out the work with enthusiasm and professionalism. In the adverse situation with rains on, it was good to see the agility with which your people carried out the work.
JeremiahL@Jeremiah8554L
Read More
The guys were excellent; timely, friendly and very helpful not to mention very professional! I will recommend you and your team any day.
Jeni Lynn@Jenilyn67961481
Read More
Thank you for your great service. Impressive delivery and customer service, always responsive to our queries. Reliable and honest business. A big note of appreciation to Excel Cargo team!
Bob Price@BobPriceBBTX
Read More
I just wanted to send you a quick note to say thanks for getting the cars and the parts to our Al Ramoul operation two days ahead of schedule, and for all your help making sure the process went smoothly.
Sarah Hill (Grabek)@SarahGrabek
Read More
I just wanted to thank you and your team for such a fantastic job last month. All of this is a result of great teamwork from all areas of the business. A really big thank you from all of us!
Soma Sekhar@somasekhar1983
Read More
I would like to thank you and your teams for the awesome job within a short period before EID. It is month by month and your support continues to make the difference for Lexus. I really appreciate your hard work.
Previous
Next

Get In Touch

Contact us now to get a quote for all your global
shipping and cargo needs.

Contact us
